mapper.select: /* 재료에 따른 레시피 리스트 */ select r.rcp_nm from recipe r inner join main_ingredient m on r.rcp_seq = m.rcp_seq inner join ingredient i on m.igr_num = i.igr_num where i.igr_name = ${igr_name}
/* 재료 리스트 */ select igr_num, igr_name from ingredient order by igr_name
/* 재료 검색 */ select igr_num, igr_name from ingredient where igr_name LIKE '%' || ${igr_name} || '%' order by igr_name
mapper.insert: insert into fridge (fridge_num, m_num, igr_num) values (SEQ_FRIDGE.nextval, #{m_num}, #{igr_num})
mapper.select: select f.fridge_num as fridge_num, f.m_num as m_num, i.igr_name as igr_name, i.igr_num as igr_num from fridge f inner join ingredient i on f.igr_num = i.igr_num where f.m_num = #{m_num}
